name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Backend Engineer with 13+ years of experience in crafting high-performance applications, focusing on **C#**, **Azure**, **Infrastructure as Code** using **Terraform** and **Bicep**, and container orchestration with **Kubernetes** and **Docker**. Proficient in backend development with strong skills in **JavaScript** and **TypeScript**. Adept in Agile methodologies, leading **SCRUM** teams to deliver efficient solutions.
Specialized in compliance-driven development, aligning with industry standards while employing **microservices** and **event-driven architectures**. Experienced in deploying cloud-native systems and implementing CI/CD pipelines. Passionate about enhancing system performance and developing scalable applications, with a proven history in the healthcare and financial sectors, while leveraging technologies such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, **Django**, and MLOps tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.

Applied SCRUM and Agile methodologies to enhance team collaboration and project delivery, resulting in a **15%** reduction in development cycle time.
Developed and maintained CI/CD pipelines, introducing automation through tools like Azure DevOps, ensuring reliable release cycles and continuous integration.
Conducted performance tuning and optimization of existing applications, leading to an increase in throughput by **30%** while maintaining high availability and reliability.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to establish testing frameworks and performance metrics, ensuring all deployments met stringent quality standards.
Mentored junior developers in best practices surrounding **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and backend architecture, fostering a culture of growth and learning within the team.

Enhanced application security measures, including vulnerability assessments and code reviews, contributing to a **10%** decrease in security incidents in production.

Collaborated with front-end teams to integrate APIs and enhance user experience, using **TypeScript** for type-safe application code and reducing bugs by **30%**.
